metadata.dc:author: Soro, José A
García-Sanz, Mario

Cordobès, Jordi
Molina, Francesc X
Alvarez-Segurado, Cristina
Salinas, Ramón
metadata.dc:description: Giant epidermoid splenic cysts are rare benign tumors. Their treatment is becoming increasingly less aggressive and more conservative. We report the case of a young woman with a giant epidermoid cyst, which required open total splenectomy, and review the literature on benign congenital tumors of the spleen.
metadata.dc:title: Quiste epidermoide esplénico gigante.
[Giant epidermoid splenic cyst].
